function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survival of viruses in different environmental conditions such as high and low relative humidity (RH)","Impact":"Increased risk of prolonged survival and transmission of viruses","Mitigation":"Maintaining optimal RH levels in indoor environments","Technologies":"Humidifiers, dehumidifiers, and HVAC systems with humidity control","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Facility management, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Transfer of viruses from surfaces to hands and subsequent transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular hand hygiene and surface disinfection","Technologies":"Hand sanitizers, surface disinfectants, and antimicrobial materials","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Individuals, facility management, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Survival of viruses in biological fluids such as mucus, feces, and blood","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through exposure to contaminated biological fluids","Mitigation":"Proper disposal of biological waste and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Biological waste disposal systems, protective clothing, and biohazard containers","People":"Healthcare workers, laboratory personnel, and cleaning staff","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, laboratories, and research institutions"}]}
